title: Himi 391
lyrics:
8.7.4.
1.
‘Oku ai ha ki’i fonua
‘Oku tu’u ‘i ‘oseni,
Na’e ‘ikai ke ma’u ‘Otua,
Na’e masiva he lelei.
Haleluia!
Kuo monū’ia ‘eni.
2.
He ne tu’u ki ai ‘a e lotu,
‘Omi ‘a e kau faifekau;
‘O fanongo ‘e he motu
Ki he me’a ‘a e Tohitapu
‘O tafoki
‘A e hou’eiki mo e Hau.
3.
Hoko ai ‘a e ‘ahi’ahi
Ki he potu tahi ni:
‘Oho mai ‘a Papālangi
Ke ne sivi ‘a e kakai:
Kuo lahi
‘A e fonua ne mole ai.
4.
He na’e lotu ‘a Tahisi,
Ka na’e ‘ikai hao ai
‘O tafoki pē mo Fisi,
Ka na’e ‘ikai haofaki:
Ka ko Tonga
‘Oku kei tolonga mai.
5.
Lau pe he palōfisai,
Toki ‘olive ‘e ua,
Pule’anga mo Siasi,
Kae mālōhi ha fonua.
Hota monū
‘Eta ma’u ha Hau kaukaua.
6.
Tama Tonga, tu’u ‘o ngāue
Ho’ koloa ke fakamonū
Lotu ki he ‘Eiki ma’u pē
Ke ne poupou ki he lotu,
‘O malu’i,
‘O malu’i ‘a Tupou. *
